程序包 modele

类 Sys

java.lang.Object
modele.Sys
直接已知子类:
SysGraph2Per
public class Sys
extends java.lang.Object

Backend system of the game witch controls the process of the game

从以下版本开始:
25 December 2020
版本:
1.0
作者:
Wang Taojun
